connection.title: Connection
connection.description: PilotSuite Core connection and service settings.

data_description.webhook_url: Read-only webhook URL for Core to push real-time updates to HA. Copy this into Core config.
data_description.host: Hostname or IP of the PilotSuite Core add-on (default: homeassistant.local)
data_description.port: Port of the PilotSuite Core add-on (default: 8909)
data_description.token: Optional token for authenticated API access. Leave empty if not configured.
data_description._clear_token: Enable this to remove the currently saved API token.
data_description.test_light_entity_id: A light entity used for the toggle test button (optional).
data_description.ollama_host: Hostname of the Ollama instance (default: localhost)
data_description.searxng_enabled: Enable SearXNG web search for the AI assistant.
data_description.searxng_host: Hostname of the SearXNG instance (leave empty to disable)

module_mood.title: Mood System
module_mood.description: Configure the mood inference engine. The mood system combines discrete states (relax, focus, active, night, away, neutral) with continuous dimensions (comfort, frugality, joy, energy, stress) for each Habitus zone.

data_description.mood_enabled: Enable automatic mood inference from entity states. Zones get a mood profile with discrete state + continuous dimensions.
data_description.mood_dashboard_enabled: Expose mood dimension sensors (comfort, joy, energy, stress, frugality) for Lovelace cards and automations.
data_description.mood_ema_alpha: Exponential Moving Average alpha (0.05-0.95). Lower = smoother transitions, higher = faster response to changes. Default: 0.3.
data_description.mood_softmax_temperature: Softmax temperature for mood state selection. Lower = more decisive (picks dominant mood), higher = more exploratory. Default: 1.0.
data_description.mood_dwell_time_seconds: Minimum time (seconds) in a mood state before transitioning. Prevents rapid oscillation. Default: 600s (10 min).
data_description.mood_history_retention_days: Number of days to keep mood history in the database. Default: 30 days.

module_media.title: Media Players
module_media.description: Configure media player entities for music and TV.

data_description.media_music_players: Media player entities used for music playback (e.g. Sonos, HomePod).
data_description.media_tv_players: Media player entities used for TV/video playback (e.g. Apple TV, Chromecast).

module_forwarder.title: Events Forwarder
module_forwarder.description: Configure which events are forwarded to PilotSuite Core.

data_description.events_forwarder_enabled: Enable real-time event forwarding from Home Assistant to PilotSuite Core.
data_description.events_forwarder_flush_interval_seconds: How often queued events are sent to Core (default: 5 seconds).
data_description.events_forwarder_max_batch: Maximum number of events per batch (default: 50).
data_description.events_forwarder_persistent_queue_enable: Queue events on disk to survive restarts.
data_description.events_forwarder_include_habitus_zones: Automatically forward events from all Habitus zone entities.
data_description.events_forwarder_include_media_players: Automatically forward events from configured media players.
data_description.events_forwarder_additional_entities: Extra entity_ids to monitor (comma-separated or multi-select).

module_seed.title: Suggestion Seed
module_seed.description: Configure suggestion seed sensors and limits.

data_description.suggestion_seed_entities: Sensor entities that trigger automation suggestions (e.g. motion, door sensors).
data_description.seed_allowed_domains: Only generate suggestions for these domains (comma-separated, e.g. light,switch).
data_description.seed_blocked_domains: Never generate suggestions for these domains (comma-separated).
data_description.seed_max_offers_per_hour: Rate limit: max suggestions per hour (default: 3).
data_description.seed_max_offers_per_update: Max suggestions per single sensor state change (default: 1).

module_user_prefs.title: User Preferences
module_user_prefs.description: Per-user tracking and Multi-User Preference Learning (MUPL).

data_description.user_preference_enabled: Track individual user preferences for personalized suggestions.
data_description.tracked_users: HA person entities to track (e.g. person.max, person.anna).
data_description.primary_user: The primary user whose preferences take priority in conflicts.
data_description.user_learning_mode: Learning mode: observe (silent), suggest (proposals), or auto (automatic).
data_description.mupl_enabled: Enable Multi-User Preference Learning for multi-person households.
data_description.mupl_retention_days: How long preference data is kept (default: 90 days).

module_waste.title: Waste Collection Reminders
module_waste.description: Configure waste collection sensors and TTS reminders.

data_description.waste_enabled: Enable waste collection reminders with optional TTS announcements.
data_description.waste_entities: Sensor entities that provide waste collection schedules.
data_description.waste_tts_enabled: Announce upcoming waste collection via TTS speakers.
data_description.waste_tts_entity: Media player entity for TTS announcements (e.g. media_player.kitchen_speaker).

module_birthday.title: Birthday Reminders
module_birthday.description: Configure birthday calendar and TTS reminders.

data_description.birthday_enabled: Enable birthday tracking and reminder notifications.
data_description.birthday_calendar_entities: Calendar entities containing birthday events (e.g. calendar.birthdays).
data_description.birthday_lookahead_days: How many days ahead to check for upcoming birthdays (default: 7).
data_description.birthday_tts_entity: Media player entity for TTS birthday announcements.
data_description.birthday_reminder_hour: Hour (0-23) for the morning birthday reminder (default: 8).

module_zone_automation.title: Zone Automation
module_zone_automation.description: Zone-based lighting, presence timeout and brightness control. Use the sliders to tune behavior per zone.

data_description.zone_automation_enabled: Enable automatic zone lighting and presence-based automation.
data_description.zone_automation_light_mode: Light control mode: auto (PilotSuite decides), manual (user only), circadian (day/night cycle), presence_only (lights on/off by motion).
data_description.zone_automation_brightness_threshold: Normalized threshold 0-100%. 0% = zone brightness is ignored (no auto-lights). 100% = lights always on when zone is occupied. The slider controls how sensitive the system reacts to brightness changes.
data_description.zone_automation_presence_timeout: Seconds after the last detected motion/presence before the zone is considered vacant. Increase this to avoid lights turning off too quickly (default: 300s = 5 min).
data_description.zone_automation_grace_period_s: Additional seconds after presence timeout before automations (lights, heating) switch to eco mode. This is the buffer period (default: 300s).
data_description.zone_automation_target_lux: Target illuminance level in lux. The system tries to maintain this brightness via dimming/switching (default: 300 lux).
data_description.zone_automation_outdoor_sensor: Optional outdoor brightness sensor (lux). Used for relative brightness mode to compare indoor vs outdoor light levels.
data_description.zone_automation_relative_brightness: Use outdoor/indoor brightness ratio instead of absolute lux values. This prevents false triggers when clouds briefly block the sun — the ratio stays stable even when absolute values drop.
data_description.zone_automation_sun_filter_seconds: Transient filter: ignore outdoor brightness drops shorter than this duration (e.g. cloud passing over the sun). Prevents lights from flickering on/off during brief weather changes (default: 120s = 2 min).

module_ha_errors.title: HA Error Digest
module_ha_errors.description: Periodically forward HA error log entries to PilotSuite Core.

data_description.ha_errors_digest_enabled: Periodically send HA error log entries to Core for analysis.
data_description.ha_errors_digest_interval_seconds: How often to collect and send error log entries (default: 300s).
data_description.ha_errors_digest_max_lines: Maximum log lines per digest batch (default: 50).

module_devlog.title: Dev Log Push
module_devlog.description: Push HA logs to PilotSuite Core for analysis.

data_description.devlog_push_enabled: Enable periodic push of HA logs to PilotSuite Core.
data_description.devlog_push_interval_seconds: How often to push log entries (default: 120s).
data_description.devlog_push_path: Core API endpoint for log ingestion (default: /api/v1/logs).

module_watchdog.title: Watchdog
module_watchdog.description: Polling watchdog to keep the connection to Core alive.

data_description.watchdog_enabled: Enable periodic health checks to keep the connection to Core alive.
data_description.enable_user_preferences: Enable user preference tracking within the watchdog module.

module_pilotsuite_ux.title: PilotSuite UI
module_pilotsuite_ux.description: Entity profile and visibility of advanced button groups.

data_description.entity_profile: core = essential entities only, full = all entities including debug/dev.
data_description.pilotsuite_show_safety_backup_buttons: Show safety and backup buttons in the PilotSuite panel.
data_description.pilotsuite_show_dev_surface_buttons: Show debug and developer buttons (only for advanced users).
data_description.pilotsuite_show_graph_bridge_buttons: Show Brain Graph → Candidate pipeline buttons.

entity_tags.title: Entity tags
entity_tags.description: Manage entity tags — assign HA entities to custom tags for targeted monitoring and LLM context.

data_description.tag_id: Unique slug identifier (lowercase, no spaces). Used internally for matching (e.g. 'licht', 'temperatur').
data_description.tag_name: Display name shown in the UI and neuron system (e.g. 'Licht', 'Temperatur').
data_description.tag_entities: Select which entities should be tagged. These become relevant for the neuron system.
data_description.tag_color: Hex color code for visual identification in dashboards (e.g. #fbbf24 for yellow).

data_description.tag_entities: Update the entities assigned to this tag. Changes affect neuron auto-resolution.

data_description.tag_id: Select which tag to permanently remove. Entities will be untagged.

habitus_zones.title: Habitus zones
habitus_zones.description: Create and manage curated zones (independent from Home Assistant Areas). Each zone needs at least one entity.

suggest_zones.title: Suggest zones
suggest_zones.description: PilotSuite Core analyzed your Home Assistant entities and suggests the following zones. Select which zones to adopt.

data_description.adopt_zones: Select zones to import from Core suggestions. Entities will be auto-tagged.

dashboard_info.title: Dashboard mode info
dashboard_info.description: PilotSuite now uses the Core/React dashboard as the primary management UI. Legacy YAML dashboards are optional and disabled by default.

data_description.back_to_menu: Return to the Habitus zones menu.

backup_restore.title: Backup / restore
backup_restore.description: Import a previously generated local config snapshot. This overwrites Habitus zones and selected options. Secrets remain unchanged if redacted.

data_description.source: Choose how to import: from a file path or by pasting JSON directly.

data_description.path: Absolute path to the snapshot JSON file on the HA host (e.g. /config/pilotsuite-styx/snapshot.json).

data_description.json: Paste the full snapshot JSON content. Must be valid JSON.

import_snapshot_confirm.title: Confirm import
import_snapshot_confirm.description:
This will import {zones} Habitus zones and update options from the snapshot.

Tokens are not imported unless explicitly included (redacted values keep your current token).

data_description.confirm: Confirm to overwrite current zones and options with snapshot data.

create_zone.title: Create Habitus zone
create_zone.description: Pick one or more areas/rooms (optional), then choose a motion/presence entity and at least one light. If area entities are available, motion and lights are auto-suggested.

data_description.area_ids: Select HA areas to pre-fill entities from. Multiple areas can be combined into one zone.
data_description.name: The zone display name (e.g. 'Wohnzimmer', 'Buero'). Used in tags and neuron system.
data_description.motion_entity_id: Primary motion/presence sensor for this zone. Drives context neurons.
data_description.light_entity_ids: Light entities in this zone. Auto-tagged as context neurons.
data_description.brightness_entity_ids: Illuminance/brightness sensors. Auto-tagged as context neurons.
data_description.humidity_entity_ids: Humidity sensors. Auto-tagged as state neurons.
data_description.co2_entity_ids: CO2 sensors. Auto-tagged as state neurons.
data_description.temperature_entity_ids: Temperature sensors. Auto-tagged as state neurons.
data_description.heating_entity_ids: Climate/heating entities. Auto-tagged as state neurons.
data_description.media_entity_ids: Media players in this zone. Auto-tagged as mood neurons.
data_description.door_entity_ids: Door contact sensors for context awareness.
data_description.optional_entity_ids: Any other entities relevant to this zone.

data_description.light_entity_ids: Light entities in this zone. Auto-tagged as context neurons.

neurons.title: Neural System Configuration
neurons.description: Configure context, state, and mood neurons. Entities are auto-resolved from your tags and Habitus zones when fields are empty. Manual selections override auto-resolution.

data_description.neuron_enabled: Enable the neural system for automatic entity evaluation and mood/context/state tracking.
data_description.neuron_evaluation_interval: How often the neural system evaluates state changes (10-3600 seconds).
data_description.neuron_context_entities: Entities for context neurons (presence, light, motion, weather). Auto-filled from tags like 'licht', 'bewegung', zone assignments.
data_description.neuron_state_entities: Entities for state neurons (temperature, humidity, energy, climate). Auto-filled from tags like 'temperatur', 'energie'.
data_description.neuron_mood_entities: Entities influencing mood (media, music, calendar). Auto-filled from tags like 'musik', 'media_player'.

generate_dashboard.title: Generate dashboard YAML
generate_dashboard.description: Creates a Lovelace YAML dashboard file for all Habitus zones. The file is saved in the pilotsuite-styx/ configuration folder (with legacy mirror in ai_home_copilot/).

data_description.confirm: Confirm to generate a new Lovelace YAML dashboard from your Habitus zones.

publish_dashboard.title: Publish dashboard to www
publish_dashboard.description: Copies the latest generated dashboard to www/pilotsuite-styx/ for easy download (with legacy mirror in www/ai_home_copilot/).

data_description.confirm: Confirm to copy the dashboard to the www folder for download.
